/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a tranquil scene of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of depth and scale to the image. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. A car is parked on the side of the road, its presence adding a touch of modernity to the otherwise serene setting. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, adding to the overall calmness of the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. The image is a beautiful representation of a typical day in Beijing, capturing the city's blend of nature and urban life.
